Title: Date And Time Functions
Description: The date(time-value, modifier, modifier, ...) function returns the date as text in the format: YYYY-MM-DD. The function accepts a time-value and zero or more modifiers to alter the date.
Parameters: time-value (e.g., 'now', '2024-08-21'), modifiers (e.g., '+1 day', 'start of month').
Returns: A string in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
Examples: SELECT date(); -- Returns the current date.
SELECT date('now', '+1 day'); -- Returns the date one day after the current date.
